message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $180.
I understand that $180 is a bit tight for you, but I really think you'll love this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $200.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $190, but that's my limit.

I understand you're close to your limit, Bob, but I think this product is worth more than $190. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'm offering it to you for $210, as you suggested. However, I'm not going to go any lower than this. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, but $210 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to walk away and buy the product from John for $120 if I don't get a better deal. I'm willing to meet you at $180, but that's my last offer.
